channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:02 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 游릭 07:02 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 05:34 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 05:34 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 04:44 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community.
item.description: 游리 04:44 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky Territorial Community-Mirorsk Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
